name: Understanding Choices in Memento Using Kantian Ethics
description: In this Analysis I discuss how one can apply Kantian Ethics to better understand the decisions characters made in the film Memento.

name: Using Utilitarianism to Understand Edge of Tomorrow
description: In this Analysis I discuss how you can use utilitarianism to understand the decisions characters made in the film Edge of Tomorrow.

name: My Rating System
description: I think that in order to be a successful movie reviewer, one needs a standard rating system to convey their opinion. This is my rating system.

name: Week One of the "Oscar Death Race" Challenge
description: Oscar season has begun, and I am on a mission to watch as many nominees as I can this year. Read about my thoughts on the films I saw in the first week.

name: Week Two of the Oscar Death Race
description: As I continue on my journey to complete the Oscar Death Race, here are my thoughts on the Oscar nominated films I saw this week.

name: Weeks Three and Four of the Oscar Death Race
description: I was very busy with homework the past few weeks, but I did see a few oscar nominated films. Here are my thoughts.

name: My Picks For the 90th Academy Awards
description: These are my opinions on who should win at the 90th Academy Awards for each category.

name: The Princess Bride Review
description: Even after 30 years the silly adventure story, The Princess Bride, still is just as charming as it was when it first released.

name: Ready Player One Review
description: Spielberg creates another exciting adventure movie with Ready Player One: a video game movie soaked in nostalgia.

name: A Quiet Place Review
description: A Quiet Place provides a suspenseful experience with it's usage of sound and the lack thereof.

name: Spiderman: Homecoming Review
description: Spiderman: Homecoming is surprisingly fun, but not free of issues.

name: Solo: A Star Wars Story Review
description: The newest movie in the Star Wars story, Solo: A Star Wars Story exceeds expectations, but feels somewhat unnessary.

name: Hereditary Review
description: Hereditary is a film full of emotional and psychological horror that feels straight out of the 1970s.

name: Swiss Army Man Review
description: Swiss Army Man is an incredibly original and underated film with a heartwarming premise.

name: Mama Mia! Here We Go Again Review
description: Mama Mia! Here We Go Again is full of ABBA songs and absolutely no plot.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale Review
description: Hachi: A Dog's Tale is very highly rated on IMDb, but does it live up to its score?

name: The BFG Review
description: I had high hopes for The BFG, but was it any good?

name: First Man Review
description: Damien  Chazelle tells a fantastic story in his most recent film, First Man.

name: Oscar Death Race: Week One 2019
description: Oscar Season has begun again, here are my thoughts on Bohemian Rhapsody, Roma, The Wife, and more.

name: My Picks For the 91st Academy Awards
description: I discuss who I think should win at the 91st Academy Awards for each category.

name: Us Review
description: I was very excited to see Jordan Peele's sophomore film, but did it live up to my expectations.
